article_title: Expired Educator Expenses & Unreimbursed Employee Expenses

article_metadata.author: Kelly Phillips Erb

og.description: The Back To School series has kicked off. This year, teachers don't have the benefit of the educator expense: that deduction expired in 2013 and Congress has not renewed it for 2014. However, all isn't lost. Teachers can still rely on the unreimbursed employee expense deduction. Here's what you need to know...
og.title: Back To School 2014: Expired Educator Expenses & Unreimbursed Employee Expenses
